mapper.update:
update schedule_job_log
job_id = #{jobId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
executor_id = #{executorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
exe_url = #{exeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exe_interface = #{exeInterface,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notify_start = #{notifyStart,jdbcType=BIGINT},
notify_end = #{notifyEnd,jdbcType=BIGINT},
finished = #{finished,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ret_msg = #{retMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notify_status = #{notifyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
return_status = #{returnStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
alert_times = #{alertTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update schedule_job_log set job_id = #{jobId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, executor_id = #{executorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, exe_url = #{exeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exe_interface = #{exeInterface,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notify_start = #{notifyStart,jdbcType=BIGINT}, notify_end = #{notifyEnd,jdbcType=BIGINT}, finished = #{finished,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ret_msg = #{retMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notify_status = #{notifyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, return_status = #{returnStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, alert_times = #{alertTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER} where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from schedule_job_log where job_id = #{jobId}
AND return_status != 1
